name: Tonight, Last Night
description:
Please play with sound!

------

I heard this song for the first time in a local soda shop in Turkey. The owner actually had a record player, and I was moved by the simplicity and beauty of this song. I ended up making a short game to accompany the song and hopefully mimic the emotions conveyed by the music and lyrics.

Neredesin Sen by great Turkish master Neset Ertas

You are the one who knows me, my sweet one, My heart is always looking for you, where are you? My smoothy, smiling one, my slim and beautiful one, My heart is always looking for you, where are you? https://lyricstranslate.com
